General.Name: Aecc Aero Engine Control Co Ltd
General.Description: Aecc Aero-Engine Control Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, repair, sale, and service of aero-engine and gas turbine control systems, and derivative products in China and internationally. The company also provides civil aviation precision parts for aviation companies, such as aero-engine rocker arms, flight control systems and fuel system slide valve components, engine pump housing components, and other precision parts. In addition, it offers control system technology derivative products, including high-end electro-hydraulic actuators for ground combat vehicles; and key components of power control system, automatic transmission actuators, high-precision solenoid valves, sensors, and other products. The company was formerly known as AVIC Aero-Engine Controls Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Aecc Aero-Engine Control Co.,Ltd. in April 2017. Aecc Aero-Engine Control Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
